extension.summary: [COLOR green]F[/COLOR]ishermans Cove - Reloaded By The [COLOR green]B[/COLOR]ank Tramp
extension.description: A Collection of Content to keep u busy on the banks! This Addon uses Openload so pairing is needed to view the streams.. We do not host content, we do not upload content, all this content is freely available online with a quick search... All I do is organise these links all into one place.. Kind Regards The [COLOR green]B[/COLOR]ank Tramp
extension.disclaimer: The [COLOR green]B[/COLOR]ank Tramp Takes No Credit Or Liability For The Content Provided!
